summary: This bill directs the Secretary of Defense to establish blast safety officer positions within the Army, Navy, Marine Corps, Air Force, and Space Force by September 30, 2026. These officers will be responsible for monitoring and mitigating blast exposure during exercises, briefing personnel on risks and mitigation, overseeing the use of protective equipment, investigating incidents, maintaining exposure logs, and coordinating with other safety personnel. The bill specifies duties and training requirements for blast safety officers, and mandates assignment to special mission units.
